00023 #include "declerations.h"
00024 
00025 void convertor( GRAPH<int,int> &G ){
00026         
00027         int count = 0, weightCount;
00028         node n;
00029         edge e;
00030         forall_nodes( n, G )
00031                 count++;
00032         leda::matrix M( count, count );
00033         for( int i = 0; i < M.dim1(); i++ ){
00034                 for( int j = 0; j < M.dim2(); j++ ){
00035                         M( i, j ) = 0;
00036                 }
00037         }
00038         list<edge> elist;
00039         list_item it;
00040         node_array<int> Index( G, 0 );
00041 
00042         count = 0;
00043         forall_nodes( n, G ){
00044                 Index[ n ] = count;
00045                 count++;
00046         }
00047 
00048         forall_nodes( n , G ){
00049                 weightCount = 0;
00050                 elist = G.out_edges( n );
00051                 forall_items( it, elist ){
00052                         e = elist[ it ];
00053                         weightCount += G[ elist[it ] ];
00054                 }
00055                 forall_items( it, elist ){
00056                         e = elist[ it ];
00057                         M( Index[ n ], Index[ G.target( e ) ] ) = (double)( G[ e ] ) / (double)( weightCount );
00058                 }
00059         }
00060         ofstream MarkovMatrix("C://GraphUnion//markov.txt", ios::in | ios::trunc);
00061         for( int i = 0; i < M.dim1(); i++ ){
00062                 for( int j = 0; j < M.dim2(); j++ ){
00063                         MarkovMatrix << M( i, j ) << " ";
00064                 }
00065                 MarkovMatrix << "\n";
00066         }
00067         MarkovMatrix.close();
00068 }
